item.title: LinkedIn purgatory and this website
item.description: TLDR: LinkedIn has randomly disabled my account, having prevented me from logging in due to a broken login system, then demanded my passport/driving licence to reinstate my account, before then blocking me from even giving that to them anyway. Greetings all, and welcome to the first post1 on this websiteâ€”a website born not of love, but of hate, vice, and spite. Which is not to say that I haven’t taken care in creating this site.
